text: Jean-Paul Belmondo (9 April 1933 - 6 September 2021) was a French actor. He was popular during the New Wave of the 1960s. ==Death== Belmondo died on 6 September 2021 at his home in Paris, aged 88.Mort de Jean-Paul Belmondo, le Magnifique du cinéma français ==Honors== Belmondo was a Commandeur of the Ordre national du Mérite He was also Commandeur of the Légion d'honneur. He received a Career Achievement award from the Los Angeles Film Critics Association Awards. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Actors from Hauts-de-Seine Category:French movie actors Category:French stage actors Category:French television actors Category:French voice actors
title: Jean-Paul Belmondo
